show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Today we will interview film producer Kristina Leigh Copeland and lawyer Wes Christian about the SF Bay Premere of... <!--more--> their new film the Wall Street Conspiracy.
Then we will hear from Richard Becker author of the publication the Rule of the Banks.
  During the second half of the show we will interview Jocelyn Boreta—Program Director of Global Exchange Fair Trade Stores and speaker at this weekend Green Festival.
We round out the show with Brian DeShazor, Director, Pacifica Radio Archives.
